titles.title: Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore Corrections Act

To amend the Act entitled "An Act to provide for the establishment of the Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore, and for other purposes" to clarify the authority of the Secretary of the Interior to accept donations of lands that are contiguous to the Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

bill.summary: 6/23/1999--Introduced. Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore Corrections Act - Amends Federal law which established the Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore to describe as lands contiguous to Lakeshore lands (and therefore authorized to be purchased by the Secretary for inclusion in the Lakeshore) lands which touch Lakeshore lands or are separated only by a public or private right-of-way.Authorizes the Secretary to acquire Lakeshore lands from units of State and local governments by the payment of delinquent taxes.
